thread.title: BRIEF-Columbia Property Sees 2018 FFO Per Share $1.41 - $1.46‍​

title: BRIEF-Columbia Property Sees 2018 FFO Per Share $1.41 - $1.46‍​
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Columbia Property Trust Inc:
* COLUMBIA PROPERTY TRUST RELEASES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND PROVIDES 2018 GUIDANCE
* ‍2018 GUIDANCE INCLUDES SUBSTANTIAL FFO AND NOI GROWTH​ * SEES 2018 FFO PER SHARE $1.41 - $1.46‍​
* QTRLY NORMALIZED FFO PER DILUTED SHARE WAS $0.32 * SEES 2018 NORMALIZED FFO PER SHARE $1.41 - $1.46‍​
* COLUMBIA PROPERTY TRUST SEES 2018 SAME STORE NOI - CASH UP 10 PERCENT - UP 12 PERCENT
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.31 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.42 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
